name.en: What I Want to Show You
name.jp: What I Want to Show You

desc.en: Chise suddenly calls Sensei, saying that there's something she wants to share. After walking quite a distance with Chise, Sensei encounters a huge group of turtles.
desc.jp: Chise suddenly calls Sensei, saying that there's something she wants to share. After walking quite a distance with Chise, Sensei encounters a huge group of turtles.
desc.zh_cn: {cf知世}突然说有东西想要给老师看，便找了老师出来。和{cf知世}走了好长一段路的老师，最后看到的是为数众多的乌龟群。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Hasumi is on a diet during the field day, but her resolve wavers when she sees other students snacking. Sensei proposes to Hasumi that they eat the honeyed lemons instead. Hasumi tells herself she will only have a little bit, but eventually loses control and eats every last lemon.
desc.jp: Hasumi is on a diet during the field day, but her resolve wavers when she sees other students snacking. Sensei proposes to Hasumi that they eat the honeyed lemons instead. Hasumi tells herself she will only have a little bit, but eventually loses control and eats every last lemon.
desc.zh_cn: 晄轮大祭当日。{cf莲实}虽然在进行饮食管理，但却因为周围的学生在谈论食物而动摇了。老师提议和{cf莲实}一起吃「蜂蜜渍柠檬」。{cf莲实}虽然叮咛自己要少吃一点，但却因为食欲爆发而全部吃光了。

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

desc.en: Sensei stumbles upon Hinata as she's carrying some bags and offers a hand. While walking through the forest, a large boulder blocks their path, but Hinata pushes it aside. Hinata and Sensei encounter several more obstacles, but Hinata solves them all with her great strength.
desc.jp: Sensei stumbles upon Hinata as she's carrying some bags and offers a hand. While walking through the forest, a large boulder blocks their path, but Hinata pushes it aside. Hinata and Sensei encounter several more obstacles, but Hinata solves them all with her great strength.
desc.zh_cn: 老师发现正在搬行李的{cf日向}，便出手帮忙。老师和{cf日向}走在林间小路时被巨大的石头挡住去路，{cf日向}用自己的怪力搬开了石头。此后虽然依然老是有障碍物阻挡{cf日向}和老师的去路，但{cf日向}都能解决。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

name.en: The Girl Still Doesn't Give Up
name.jp: The Girl Still Doesn't Give Up

desc.en: Hiyori finds a fashion magazine she likes in a paper-waste bin and rejoices. However, her spirits couldn't be lifted for long, and she tells her dark story.
desc.jp: Hiyori finds a fashion magazine she likes in a paper-waste bin and rejoices. However, her spirits couldn't be lifted for long, and she tells her dark story.
desc.zh_cn: 在废纸回收箱发现自己喜欢的时尚杂志，而感到高兴的{cf日和}。但是{cf日和}很快又再次对自己的处境感到悲观，并说起了黑暗的故事。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

name.en: The Girl Still Wants to Read
name.jp: The Girl Still Wants to Read

name.en: The Girl Still Wants to Know
name.jp: The Girl Still Wants to Know

desc.en: Sensei and Kayoko visit a temple to buy an amulet. They drink warm gamju to warm their cold bodies. The sound of a cat crying in the distance causes Kayoko to leave the room for a moment, and when Sensei belatedly follows her, they find her happily playing with the cat.
desc.jp: Sensei and Kayoko visit a temple to buy an amulet. They drink warm gamju to warm their cold bodies. The sound of a cat crying in the distance causes Kayoko to leave the room for a moment, and when Sensei belatedly follows her, they find her happily playing with the cat.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cf佳世子}为了购买御守而前往了神社。为了让身体变暖，两人喝了温热的甘酒。听见某处传来的猫叫声后，{cf佳世子}便往声音的方向走过去，后来跟上去的老师看见{cf佳世子}和猫咪开心玩在一起的景象。

name.en: Bells Ringing in the New Year
name.jp: Bells Ringing in the New Year

desc.en: Sensei visits a convenience store to buy lunch and finds Kazusa there, but she avoids Sensei. Finally, she explains she avoided Sensei because she wasn't wearing makeup. Sensei assures her that she has nothing to worry about, and Kazusa is taken aback.
desc.jp: Sensei visits a convenience store to buy lunch and finds Kazusa there, but she avoids Sensei. Finally, she explains she avoided Sensei because she wasn't wearing makeup. Sensei assures her that she has nothing to worry about, and Kazusa is taken aback.
desc.zh_cn: 老师为了买午餐而去了便利商店。老师虽然在便利商店发现了{cf千纱}，但{cf千纱}却装作不知情并躲避着老师。结果和老师撞到才现身的{cf千纱}。{cf千纱}说因为没有化妆，所以才会躲着老师。之后{cf千纱}和老师稍微聊一下天之后就分开了。

hobby.jp: 「普通に」スイーツを食べること

name.en: This Is the After-School Sweets Club
name.jp: This Is the After-School Sweets Club
name.zh_cn: 我好歹也是{cn放学后的甜点部}成员

hobby.jp: 「普通に」スイーツを食べること

desc.en: Kotori comes to teach Sensei how to stretch. When Kotori starts stretching, it doesn't go as planned and she becomes disheartened. Sensei comforts Kotori and they continue to stretch together.
desc.jp: Kotori comes to teach Sensei how to stretch. When Kotori starts stretching, it doesn't go as planned and she becomes disheartened. Sensei comforts Kotori and they continue to stretch together.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚都梨}来找老师，说有东西要给老师看。{cf亚都梨}想给老师看的东西是伸展运动。{cf亚都梨}气势十足地开始拉筋，不过做得却没有预期中好，这让他感到沮丧。老师安慰{cf亚都梨}，一起继续拉筋。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: 先生は、ショッピングモールでライオンマルの餌選びに悩んでいるマコトと遭遇する。その時、突然倒れたマコトを連れて病院を訪れるが、マコトは猫アレルギーと診断される。しかし、マコトは最後までライオンマルの世話をすると宣言するのだった。
desc.jp: 先生は、ショッピングモールでライオンマルの餌選びに悩んでいるマコトと遭遇する。その時、突然倒れたマコトを連れて病院を訪れるが、マコトは猫アレルギーと診断される。しかし、マコトは最後までライオンマルの世話をすると宣言するのだった。
desc.zh_cn: 先生は、ショッピングモールでライオンマルの饵选びに悩んでいるマコトと遭遇する。その时、突然倒れたマコトを连れて病院を访れるが、マコトは猫アレルギーと诊断される。しかし、マコトは最后までライオンマルの世话をすると宣言するのだった。

club.jp: パンデモニウム・ソサエティー

hobby.jp: 計略、悪巧み、イブキと遊ぶこと
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 计略、悪巧み、イブキと游ぶこと

hobby.jp: 計略、悪巧み、イブキと遊ぶこと
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 计略、悪巧み、イブキと游ぶこと

desc.en: Marina has been assigned to clean the bathrooms as punishment for shattering the statue of President Cherino. She relunctantly cleans the bathroom spotlessly with perfect skill.
desc.jp: Marina has been assigned to clean the bathrooms as punishment for shattering the statue of President Cherino. She relunctantly cleans the bathroom spotlessly with perfect skill.
desc.zh_cn: 因打破{cf洁莉诺}会长雕像的{cf玛丽娜}得到清扫厕所的处罚。虽然{cf玛丽娜}嘴里在抱怨，但却完美的把厕所打扫干净。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

desc.en: Toki tells Sensei that she's running late. Sensei, concerned about her uncharacteristic behavior, visits her workshop to look for her. She's surprised by the visit, and explains to Sensei her attempts to become the most powerful maid with the most thorough equipment maintenance.
desc.jp: Toki tells Sensei that she's running late. Sensei, concerned about her uncharacteristic behavior, visits her workshop to look for her. She's surprised by the visit, and explains to Sensei her attempts to become the most powerful maid with the most thorough equipment maintenance.
desc.zh_cn: 因私事而迟到的{cf季}请求谅解。因为{cf季}的行为太反常了，老师便前往工房查看{cf季}的状况。老师突然的造访让她吓了一跳，但她向老师解释说自己为了成为最强的女仆，正在严格检验装备当中。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

name.en: My Chance to Show My Ninja Skills!
name.jp: My Chance to Show My Ninja Skills!

desc.en: Sensei and Tsukuyo run into a girl who has lost a puppy and they promise to use Tsukuyo's ninja abilities to find the puppy. They successfully find it, but Tsukuyo gets stuck between some walls.
desc.jp: Sensei and Tsukuyo run into a girl who has lost a puppy and they promise to use Tsukuyo's ninja abilities to find the puppy. They successfully find it, but Tsukuyo gets stuck between some walls.
desc.zh_cn: 遇到小狗走失少女的老师和{cf月夜}，答应她会运用这段时间锻炼过的忍者能力，帮她找到小狗。不久之后，虽然顺利成功找到了小狗，但是偏偏{cf月夜}在那时陷入被夹在墙壁之间的困境。

hobby.jp: 身代わりの術、息を潜めること

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.jp: Do You Think I Can Be a Great Kunoichi?

hobby.jp: 身代わりの術、息を潜めること

desc.en: After all of the commotion, Sensei returns to the old library to thank Ui, who treats them with a more genuine and honest attitude.
desc.jp: After all of the commotion, Sensei returns to the old library to thank Ui, who treats them with a more genuine and honest attitude.
desc.zh_cn: 所有事情都结束后的古书馆。老师前来感谢{cf忧}的帮忙，{cf忧}比起以前的态度，稍微能更直率了些。

hobby.jp: 読書、書籍の管理、古書の研究
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 阅读、书籍管理、古书研究
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 读书、管理书籍、研究古书

name.en: The Clumsy Sister and the Magician of the Old Library
name.jp: The Clumsy Sister and the Magician of the Old Library
name.zh_cn: 冒失修女和古书馆的魔术师

desc.en:
An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake!
But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.jp:
An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake!
But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.zh_cn: {sn三一}重要的经典变得四分五裂了！为了复原经典，{cf日向}与老师在{sn三一}各处东奔西跑。究竟能不能在典礼开始前完成复原呢！？

name.en: Messengers of the Black Tortoise Part 2
name.jp: Messengers of the Black Tortoise Part 2

desc.en: Shizuko and the others defeat Date Meowru and the Kurogame Gang. Then they hear Kaiser PMC was also hired by Date Meowru.
desc.jp: Shizuko and the others defeat Date Meowru and the Kurogame Gang. Then they hear Kaiser PMC was also hired by Date Meowru.
desc.zh_cn: 打倒了黑龟组和喵天丸的一行人，受到了喵天丸提案是否和{sn其他}岛屿同样缔结加盟契约。将其提案以一句「梦话就留到梦里说吧」一脚踢开的{cf静子}，前往了下一个岛屿。

hobby.en: Studying the art of ninjutsu, serving her lord
hobby.jp: 忍術の勉強、主殿の護衛

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

hobby.en: Serving and charming customers, Idol Punch
hobby.jp: 可愛く接客すること、看板娘パンチ
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 可爱地接待客人、看板娘拳

desc.en: Umika is a student studying at Hyakkiyako, a member of the Festival Management Committee.
desc.jp: Umika is a student studying at Hyakkiyako, a member of the Festival Management Committee.
desc.zh_cn: 海花是一名百鬼夜行的学生，节庆营运管理部的一名成员。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

name.en: Messengers of the Black Tortoise Part 1
name.jp: Messengers of the Black Tortoise Part 1

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

name.en: Cath Palug, the Sealed Beast Part 2
name.jp: Cath Palug, the Sealed Beast Part 2

desc.en: The After-School Sweets Club continues the same routine as always. Sensei and Kazusa arrive late and find Reisa in the room. Reisa hears the story of Cath Palug from the After-School Sweets Gang and challenges Kazusa again.
desc.jp: The After-School Sweets Club continues the same routine as always. Sensei and Kazusa arrive late and find Reisa in the room. Reisa hears the story of Cath Palug from the After-School Sweets Gang and challenges Kazusa again.
desc.zh_cn: {cn放学后的甜点部}的部室跟以前没有什么两样。比较晚到的老师和{cf千纱}发现了待在部室的{cf澪纱}。从放学后的甜点团那里听说凯茜．帕鲁格的英雄事迹后，燃起斗志的{cf澪纱}又再次向{cf千纱}提出挑战。

hobby.jp: 「普通に」スイーツを食べること
ロマンチックなこと、思索

hobby.en: Participating in events, collecting limited-edition desserts
hobby.jp: イベントごと、限定スイーツ巡り
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 参加活动、收集限定版甜点
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 参加活动、收藏限定甜点

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Cath Palug, the Sealed Beast Part 1
name.jp: Cath Palug, the Sealed Beast Part 1

name.en: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.jp: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.zh_cn: 放学后的甜点故事～甜秘密和枪击战～

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

name.en: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.jp: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.zh_cn: 放学后的甜点故事～甜秘密和枪击战～

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

desc.en: The members of the Game Development Department start by deciphering the Calling Cards in order to stop the Benevolent Thief, who steals the the things that they've marked without fail. With Yuzu's help, they succeed in unlocking the secret of the Calling Card.
desc.jp: The members of the Game Development Department start by deciphering the Calling Cards in order to stop the Benevolent Thief, who steals the the things that they've marked without fail. With Yuzu's help, they succeed in unlocking the secret of the Calling Card.
desc.zh_cn: 为了竭尽所能阻止预告的物品被「慈爱的怪盗」窃取，{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定先开始解读预告函。多亏{cf柚子}的活跃表现，成功解开预告函的秘密了。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

name.en: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.jp: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.zh_cn: 纯白的预告信～虚饰之馆与美学所在之处～

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将{cf桃井}误认为{cnC&C}的{cf宁瑠}──没注意到这点就接下委托的{cf桃井}和{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定换上女仆装扮演{cnC&C}。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

name.en: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.jp: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.zh_cn: 纯白的预告信～虚饰之馆与美学所在之处～

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将{cf桃井}误认为{cnC&C}的{cf宁瑠}──没注意到这点就接下委托的{cf桃井}和{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定换上女仆装扮演{cnC&C}。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

desc.en: Toki and the rest of the Game Development Department face off against Benevolent Thief. When Midori falls down the stairs, Benevolent Thief saves her and disappears, leaving behind a mysterious comment. Toki reveals that she was sent here on a mission by C&C and agrees to work with the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Toki and the rest of the Game Development Department face off against Benevolent Thief. When Midori falls down the stairs, Benevolent Thief saves her and disappears, leaving behind a mysterious comment. Toki reveals that she was sent here on a mission by C&C and agrees to work with the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人与{cf季}围攻慈爱的怪盗。{cf绿}不幸从阶梯上掉下来，慈爱的怪盗伸出援手救了她，说了一句意味深长的话后便消失不见。{cf季}说自己是因为{cnC&C}的任务才会潜入此地，后来决定和{cn游戏开发部}一起行动。
